All albums

G N' R Lies

G N' R Lies, also known as Lies, is the second studio album by American hard rock band Guns N' Roses, released in 1988. While officially an extended play, it was treated as a studio album when released. According to the RIAA, the album has sold over five million copies in the United States. "Patience" was the only single released from Lies; it peaked at #4 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also their last to feature drummer Steven Adler.
